translations: v.取出内脏（gut 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: I was gutting fish when he started talking to me.
sentences.translation: 我正在清鱼内脏，这时他开始对我讲话。

sentences.sentence: And you get the pleasant task of gutting your own fish.
sentences.translation: 一个很令人愉快的任务是宰你自己养的鱼啦（囧啊，是真的吗？ 谁愿意择鱼啊，都愿意吃！）

sentences.sentence: For that, you're better off just gutting a cheap travel clock.
sentences.translation: 因此，你最好打消随便买个旅行闹钟的念头。
